PackageOracle.name: DA_SOURCE_STREET_ADDRESS_XREF
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_SOURCE_STREET_ADDRESS_XREF
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.18.608012000 PM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,source_system_address_id IN VARCHAR2
,address_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,source_system_address_id IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_source_street_address_xref;

body.name: DA_SOURCE_STREET_ADDRESS_XREF
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_SOURCE_STREET_ADDRESS_XREF
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.18.617296000 PM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,source_system_address_id IN VARCHAR2
,address_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_source_street_address_xref.add, parms=' || source_system_address_id || '|' || address_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_source_street_address_xref a
(
a.source_system_address_id
,a.address_id
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.source_system_address_id
,add.address_id
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_source_street_address_xref.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,source_system_address_id IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_source_street_address_xref.del, parms=' || source_system_address_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_source_street_address_xref a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.source_system_address_id = del.source_system_address_id
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_source_street_address_xref.del');

END del;

END da_source_street_address_xref;
